00005 BEHAVIOR_STATUS CountLimitNode::execute(void* agent)
00006 {
00007         if (current_rep == limit)
00008                 return BT_FAILURE;
00009         if (children.size()== 0)
00010         {
00011                 current_rep++;
00012                 return BT_SUCCESS;
00013         }
00014         else
00015         {
00016                 BEHAVIOR_STATUS status = children.at(0)->execute(agent);
00017                 if (status == BT_SUCCESS || status == BT_FAILURE)
00018                 {
00019                         current_rep++; //only increment the count when we've finished a job
00020                         initChildren(agent);
00021                 }
00022                 return status;
00023         }
00024 }

00026 void CountLimitNode::init( void* agent )
00027 {
00028         if (allow_reinitialize)
00029         {
00030                 current_rep = 0;
00031         }
00032         initChildren(agent);
00033 }
00034 
00035 void CountLimitNode::initChildren(void* agent)
00036 {
00037         if (children.size() == 1)
00038                 children.at(0)->init(agent);
00039 }

00041 BehaviorTreeInternalNode* CountLimitNode::addChild( BehaviorTreeNode* newChild )
00042 {
00043         if (children.size() == 0)
00044                 BehaviorTreeInternalNode::addChild(newChild);
00045         else
00046                 throw new std::exception("Cannot add more than one child to a count limit node");
00047 
00048         return this;
00049 }

00051 CountLimitNode::CountLimitNode(int _limit,bool _allow_reinitialize)
00052 {
00053         limit = _limit;
00054         allow_reinitialize = _allow_reinitialize;
00055         current_rep = 0;
